Hello,
I want to load one XAP file dynamically into another. Is it possible through Prism Module?
For example, I have two silverlight application(SLApp1 and SLApp2) and one Silverlight class lib. SLApp2 contains referance of class lib. when i build the app, it is creating 2 xap file. Now in SLApp1, i want to load xap file of SLApp2. I want to load SLApp2 assembly into original assembly.

I able to load SLApp2 xap file into Assembly variable through some code. but in this case, that assembly variable need to be live all time to read values from it. I want entire SLApp2 assembly to be loaded in original assembly. Not in memory.

Thanks,
Chirag Patel
